member.summary: The name of the extension.

member.summary: The version code of the extension. Is displayed to the user.

member.summary: The build number of the extension. Is increased with every release.

member.name: F:VisualDesignCafe.NestedPrefabs.NestedPrefabsConfig.SERIALIZED_FORMAT
member.summary: The format of the Nested Prefab serialization. If any changes are made to the serialzed data this value should be increase so Nested Prefabs will be reinstalled on every machine and project.

member.summary: Should the extension check for updates?

member.summary: When set to 'true' will reinstall Nested Prefabs after recompiling scripts or restarting the editor
